name: Redacted: An Unus Annus Fangame
description:
This is Redacted, a game I made for my SGB RETURNERS Jam.

You can download the game file, and play the game that I made for the jam.

Or, if you use Smile Game Builder (SGB), you can also download and use the RedactedPROJECT-FILES in your project.  There is good framework here that you can re-use or make into something completely different!

It plays like 'I'm On Observation Duty' and is a fangame meant to honor Unus Annus.

You can see the entire creation of this game start to finish on my YouTube channel (amalgamash).

I will be trying to update the visuals and add more anomalies over time.

Thank you for playing :)
